VenderInfo.Name: Cypress
VenderInfo.Description: The Cypress Flexible Microcontroller (FM) Peripheral Driver Library (PDL) is a software enablement product released in a single integrated package supporting FM MCU device series. It integrates device header files, startup code, peripheral drivers, and a set of code examples. The basic device support and peripheral drivers abstract the hardware function into a set of easy-to-use APIs so that customers can focus their main efforts on application development rather than on setting up board support to interface with the hardware. The code examples demonstrate the driver usage, serve as the evaluation platform for users, and can be used as a project starting point for customers to start their own product prototyping and development. The FM PDL also supports industrial leading software development tools.

Package.Name: PDL 2.1.0
Package.Description: This package install the Cypress Peripheral Driver Library 2.1.0.
